projects.name: Online wedding invitations
projects.overview: Digital Wedding Invitation Platform A Full-stack web application that personalizes wedding invitations with unique guest links and automated QR codes. The system features a real-time RSVP dashboard using WebSockets to instantly notify hosts of guest interactions, ensuring efficient event management.
projects.solution:
The platform replaces traditional paper invitations with a fully digital, personalized invitation system.
Each guest receives a unique invitation link embedded with a QR code, allowing hosts to track attendance accurately and securely.

The system centralizes guest management, RSVP responses, and attendance status into a real-time dashboard powered by WebSockets. This enables instant updates when guests confirm, decline, or scan their invitation, eliminating manual follow-ups and reducing organizational effort.

By automating invitation distribution, RSVP tracking, and attendance verification, the platform streamlines wedding event management while enhancing guest experience through a modern, seamless digital flow.

projects.name: 2D RPG Game Engine (Game Counterstrike Journey)
projects.overview:
"Counterstrike Journey" is a classic 2D Action-RPG developed entirely from scratch using Core Java and the NetBeans IDE, without relying on any third-party game engines. This project was conceived to demonstrate a deep understanding of software architecture and object-oriented programming principles.

As the sole Full-Stack Developer and UI Designer, I built the entire system including the game loop logic, graphical rendering, and user interface. The game features an immersive world with distinct biomes (Dungeon, Snow), a dynamic day/night cycle, a complex inventory system, and challenging boss fights with custom AI patterns. It serves as a comprehensive showcase of my ability to handle complex logic and resource management in a standalone application.
projects.solution:
To achieve a performant and scalable RPG system using only Java SE, I implemented the following technical approaches:

Custom Game Engine Architecture:

Implemented a high-precision Game Loop ensuring a stable 60 FPS update/render cycle using Java Threads and DeltaTime calculation to decouple game logic from frame rate.

Utilized Object-Oriented Programming (OOP) extensively, applying Polymorphism and Inheritance to create a scalable Entity system (handling Player, NPCs, Enemies, and Projectiles within a unified hierarchy).

Advanced Rendering & Lighting:

Developed a custom rendering pipeline using Java AWT and Graphics2D to manage pixel-perfect sprite drawing.

Designed a dynamic Lighting System for the Day/Night cycle using Alpha Composite layers to create a "Fog of War" effect and realistic light sources around the player.

Game Logic & Data Structures:

Collision Detection: Built a custom rectangle-intersection algorithm to handle interactions between the player, tilemaps, and enemies.

State Management: Implemented a GameStateManager to handle seamless transitions between Menu, Gameplay, Inventory, and Pause states.

Persistence: Developed a file I/O system to serialize player data (stats, inventory, position), enabling robust Save/Load functionality.

projects.name: Citric Store - Digital Application Distribution Platform
projects.overview: "Citric Store" marks my first milestone as a software developer—a capstone team project focused on building a web-based marketplace for digital applications and games. The platform functions similarly to an app store, allowing users to browse a catalog of games and software, view detailed specifications, add items to a shopping cart, and proceed to checkout. The goal was to understand the fundamental flow of an E-commerce system, from product display to order processing, while creating a visually engaging user experience tailored for gamers.
projects.solution:
As a foundational project, our team focused on core web functionalities and user interface design:

Thematic UI/UX Design:

Designed a distinctive Dark & Yellow color scheme to create a modern, energetic "Gaming" atmosphere.

Built a responsive layout that showcases game banners and high-quality thumbnails effectively.

Core E-commerce Features:

Product Management: Developed pages for "Product Listings" and detailed "Product Descriptions" (including specs, ratings, and pricing).

Search Engine: Implemented a search bar allowing users to quickly find apps by name or keywords (e.g., "King", "Goat").

Shopping Cart Logic: Built a session-based shopping cart system where users can add items, update quantities, or remove products before payment.

Checkout & Validation:

Created a checkout workflow that collects customer information (Name, Email, Phone, Banking details).

Implemented form validation to ensure data integrity during the ordering process.

projects.name: DaoComics - Mobile Manga & Comic Reader App
projects.overview: DaoComics is a native Android application designed to provide a seamless digital reading experience for manga and comic enthusiasts. In a market flooded with complex reading apps, our team aimed to build a user-centric platform that focuses on speed, simplicity, and personalization. The app allows users to browse a vast library of genres (Action, Romance, Horror), manage their favorite titles, and enjoy high-quality content with an intuitive navigation system. As the Team Leader, I guided the project from conceptualization to the final MVP (Minimum Viable Product), ensuring the integration between the Android client and Firebase backend was robust and efficient.
projects.solution:
To deliver a high-performance mobile app, I implemented the following technical strategies:

Modern UI/UX Implementation:

Designed a clean, minimalist interface using XML and Material Design principles with a cohesive color theme (Purple/White).

Implemented complex RecyclerView adapters to handle dynamic lists of comics and chapters efficiently, ensuring smooth scrolling performance even with large datasets.

Developed a "Webtoon-style" vertical reading view, optimizing image loading for mobile screens.

Firebase Integration (Serverless Architecture):

Authentication: Integrated Firebase Auth to handle secure Sign-up/Login processes (including "Forgot Password" flows) and session management.

Realtime Database: Structured the NoSQL database to store user profiles, comic metadata, and reading history in real-time, allowing for instant updates across devices.

Project Management (Leadership):

Adopted Agile methodologies to break down features into sprints.

Conducted code reviews and merged Front-end components with Back-end logic to minimize conflicts and bugs.

projects.name: One Store - Digital Bookstore Application
projects.overview:
One Store is a cross-platform mobile application developed with Flutter, designed to function as a comprehensive digital bookstore. The app provides a seamless interface for users to browse various book categories, search for specific titles, view detailed product information, and manage a "Favorites" list.

As the Team Leader, I defined the project architecture and guided the team through the development lifecycle. Simultaneously, as a Full Stack Developer, I handled the end-to-end implementation—creating the visual interface and building the underlying database logic to ensure the app functions smoothly offline and online.
projects.solution:
To build a robust and user-friendly application, I implemented the following technical solutions:

Clean Architecture & Modular Design:

Structured the project into distinct layers: data (models, providers, database) and page (UI screens like Home, Login, Product Details) to ensure code maintainability and scalability.

Designed a reusable widget system (e.g., homescreenwidget.dart, panner.dart) to optimize development time and consistency.

Local Backend Implementation (SQLite):

Developed a DatabaseHelper class using SQLite to manage the User Authentication system (Login/Signup) directly on the device.

Wrote raw SQL queries to handle CRUD operations, ensuring secure and fast data retrieval for user profiles.

Advanced UI/UX Implementation:

Integrated flutter_staggered_grid_view to create a dynamic, Pinterest-like layout for displaying book covers, handling different image aspect ratios gracefully.

Implemented carousel_slider for the "FeaturedBanner" section to highlight top-selling books and promotions.

Built a custom Navigation system using circle_nav_bar for a modern, animated user experience.

Security & Storage:

Utilized flutter_secure_storage and shared_preferences to manage session data and sensitive user information securely.
